This study begin 1-week lead-in phase , participant receive placebo medication . Participants whose depression level decrease continue treatment phase study , eligible cocaine relapse therapy medication deem necessary treating psychiatrist . Participants remain depressed follow lead-in phase randomly assign receive either venlafaxine placebo 12 week . Participants assign venlafaxine initially receive daily dose 37.5 mg. After 4 day , dose increase 75 mg ; week thereafter , dose increase another 75 mg , maximum 300 mg per day , dependent side effect positive response . Study visit take place twice week . At visit , medication side effect depression level assess , cocaine level monitor urine test , self-reports complete . Blood drawn per month laboratory test . Participants also attend therapy session week , meet psychiatrist every week assessment . Participants show decrease depression 12 week treatment continue additional 12 week monitor cocaine use depression level .
